nodes.name: Inside Maridia Tube
nodes.note: Represents the inside of the tube; unlocking this node breaks the tube

nodes.name: Above Maridia Tube
nodes.note: Represents the area just above the tube; unlocking this node breaks the tube

nodes.name: Below Maridia Tube
nodes.note: Represents the area just below the tube; unlocking this node breaks the tube

to.note: This direct link involves using an adjacent room without water physics to initiate a jump that takes Samus through the top door. The runway is to get enough speed to clear the edge of the tube. This wouldn't work for a submerged runway rendered usable by Gravity, but Gravity renders this strat redundant anyway.

nodes.name: Morph Passage
nodes.note: It's not quite a door, but it is a morph passage transition to another room

to.note: Getting up here suitless using frozen enemies requires one Super
The short charge actually has 2 steep up tiles, but one is against a wall so it was excluded
Getting up here suitless and hjless requires 2 Supers
This link mostly exists because it will become useful as an alternate to walljumping. IBJ can't be done from 5 to 4 and must be directly from 1.
A midair springball jump is *doable* here, but you need to start laterally before the pause happens which is on another level of difficulty

nodes.name: Morph Passage
nodes.note: It's not quite a door, but it is a morph passage transition to another room

to.note: One-way link for shinesparking. Note that it requires one shinespark to open the door and a second to get in it.
One-way link for diagonal suitless shinesparking.
The crab climb method requires one Super
The crab climb strat requires 1 super
Technically an IBJ would have to be done from node 8, but it's here instead on the basis that 11->8 has no reqs, in order to make pathing more linear
Turtle herding requires taking at least one mama turtle hit

nodes.name: Bottom Right Door to Warehouse Entrance
Top Right Door to Crab Hole
